comments:
When creating a new statistical analysis editor, the wizard throws a
ClassCastException and fails to complete. The following exception is thrown:

java.lang.ClassCastException
        at org.eclipse.swt.layout.FillLayout.computeChildSize(FillLayout.java:14
1)
        at org.eclipse.swt.layout.FillLayout.computeSize(FillLayout.java:119)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite.computeSize(Composite.java:213)
        at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog$PageContainerFillLayout.compute
Size(WizardDialog.java:194)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite.computeSize(Composite.java:213)
A fix has been checked into TPTP 4.0 i4 for this.
